channel.title: jimgrisham tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from jimgrisham.

item.description: @ClimateKev @hausfath @meinshausen @Laura_Cozzi_ @IEA #Blaze, said Gaia? https://t.co/udmPSUDQTo

@thesarahkelly It’s sad they couldn’t agree to re-purpose one of the existing ‘N11’ codes for this. I fear some may try dialing ‘998’ instead of ‘988’ when in crisis. PSA: the existing toll-free number (to which 988 forwards) will continue to function indefinitely: https://t.co/8cFx7CXuP5
@1karipilled @muttmoder A small library near where my grandparents lived loans has loaned out _framed artwork_ since at least the 1980s!

@dantose @Lamergier2 @RyanRadia @the_transit_guy Many of the ‘standard-speed’ long-distance @Amtrak routes are already booked at 90% or more capacity for this month. (that’s not normal, and likely due to high petrol and airfare prices, but it shows that plenty of people are willing to take up to 2.5 day! trips at times)
@vanalex_hex_i @jtasakorn @Intolerantcentr @igorsushko It’s a city dept. of transportation bridge maintenance truck… perhaps they’re using it as a target.
@TemplarScribe @igorsushko https://t.co/Fb3hA9iOdp

@Turiddu50688647 @lisa_wildiris68 @igorsushko I believe the Honda petrol/electric hybrids (‘Insight’?) are some of the only recent high-production-volume vehicles in the US with rear wheels covered for aerodynamic purposes.
@vanalex_hex_i @lj2585 @igorsushko https://t.co/Fb3hA91cOP

@levou @Intolerantcentr @igorsushko I mean, the first two buildings after the exit are a bank headquarters and Apple’s Seattle offices, so perhaps that’s scary? (It looks like there may be new lane separator median inside the tunnel, so it _may_ be safer now.)
@jtasakorn @Intolerantcentr @igorsushko For the non-locals: https://t.co/gIH2Thd1p7
@tonttu_torvinen @YaKiss7 @TrentTelenko How much to they have to pay the workers / suppliers / etc. not to run off with the raw materials and components?

@brianstelter The 11pm EDT broadcast might find substantial viewership outside of that timezone. For those in the western states, the actual, live, ‘prime time’ hearings are taking place during commute / dinner hours.

@OHelp_Me_Rhonda @douglasjkeurig I’ve heard from several folks from US mid-Atlantic region: … during the height of summer the cloudless sky sometimes appears more white than blue. - Maybe they’re mistaken? - Pollution? - Humidity + temperature?
@BarbiePodgorski @zerocovid4kids @MaggieM00021130 Is this in all of Canada or only certain provinces? Can regular folk get a #NAAT, at least?
@LiberalResults @jeichlerlevine Perhaps that’s more of an indictment of end-stage capitalism, inequality, and other systemic factors than of the individuals themselves…

@BergqvistRene @PhillipsPOBrien @TheStudyofWar @criticalthreats While it may not be their intention, this could actually benefit Ukraine in the mid-to-long* term by making Putin complacent enough to further over-extend Russia. (* Enormous short-term human toll, however)

@chriswintersva @PhillipsPOBrien @TheStudyofWar @criticalthreats It sounds like there’s not an enormous population quantity left, in many cases, to ‘occupy’ once the battle rolls through an area once or twice…

@jim_enloe @ArmchairG3neral @OSpurdo @WarObserver14 @kms_d4k @dim0kq The one they were testing in early 2021 (with terminal p/n 00105950-501): Ku-band antenna (012987-501) Tx gain: 34.2 dBi Beamwidth: 3.5deg. (HPBW) Tx power: 3.2 W Tx ERP: 5.1 kW Tx EIRP: 39.1 dBW 14.125 & 14.375 GHz antenna patterns: https://t.co/AXP5PGj1z6
@Debkrol @aurabogado Agreed - you were clear. (I just wanted to emphasize to folks that there was still a significant period of time with little-to-no ventilation.)

@Debkrol @aurabogado Risk: Terminal > in seat while engines running … but … Boarding / unboarding > terminal > in seat while engines running [_If_ shore ventilation is hooked up (those flexible yellow hoses from the JetWay) it’s still less effective than that provided by the engine bleed air.]

@DanielH62075987 @dwery @hdevreij @MarzMerco Most of those systems traditionally required a ground station staying stationary for up to few minutes at a time at each location to get such a precise fix.
